Package it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.view

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TableInterface
    Interface given to special component that needs to interact with the View
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    TableView
    Equivalent of the Model Table but simplified for the View.
    TableViewTest
    This test aims to control all the TableView functionality, to verify if this class can manage all the Controller update messages, like the dice updates, the placement of the cards
    TerminalView  
    View
    Class that represent the Abstract View of the MVC, it handles all the input/output methods for the game
